starve.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat
starve.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death  (=die from lack of food).
starve.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to prevent someone from having enough food to live
starve.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The poor dog looked like it had been starved.
